name: @nc/component-loader
description: This is our standard to load simple components for plain javascript projects

scripts.compile: babel lib/components.js > dist/components.js && babel lib/create.js > dist/create.js && babel lib/index.js > dist/index.js && babel lib/instances.js > dist/instances.js && babel lib/observe.js > dist/observe.js && babel lib/register.js > dist/register.js && babel lib/run.js > dist/run.js && babel lib/uuid.js > dist/uuid.js

author: Netcentric
